SurveyQuestionChoice.name: SurveyQuestionChoice
SurveyQuestionChoice.description: Represents an answer choice that a participant can select for a survey question.

DeveloperName.description: The unique API name of the SurveyQuestionChoice object.

DisplayOrder.description: The order in which the question choice is displayed within the parent question. This field is available in API v55.0 and later, with Feedback Management - Starter and Feedback Management - Growth licenses.

IsDeprecated.description: Indicates whether a question choice was deleted from the survey.

Name.description: A label for the question choice that appears in the UI.

QuestionId.description: The ID of the SurveyQuestion object that this choice belongs to.

SurveyVersionId.description: The version of the survey that this question choice belongs to.
